title: Is using the phrase "That's the spirit" to encourage people permissible? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in from uk he said when some people encourage others by saying after they fall down and they stand up and try to fight their environment and circumstances they say yeah that's a spirit usually people don't refer to the spirit of angels or the spirits of the holy ghost etc the spirit of fighting calamities the spirit of being self-motivated and there's nothing wrong in that inshallah
